bug.author: robertnishihara
bug.summary: The node_failures.py long running stress test crashes after a few minutes.
bug.description: The relevant test is <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ray-project/ray/blob/master/ci/long_running_tests/workloads/node_failures.py>https://github.com/ray-project/ray/blob/master/ci/long_running_tests/workloads/node_failures.py</denchmark-link> . comments.comment: Closing because stale. Feel free to reopen if necessary.
